mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_notification ( notification_id, notification_type, target_site_code, content, target_puuid, sub_seq, icon_url, action_dt ) VALUES ( #{notificationId}, #{notificationType}, #{targetSiteCode}, #{content}, #{targetPuuid}, #{subSeq}, #{iconUrl}, #{actionDt} )
mapper.select: SELECT notification_seq, notification_id, notification_type, target_site_code, content, read_yn, read_dt, reg_dt, target_puuid, sub_seq, icon_url, action_dt FROM site_notification WHERE target_puuid = #{puuid} AND reg_dt >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days' ORDER BY notification_seq desc LIMIT 10
